personalInfo.name: Alex Doe
personalInfo.title: Senior Full-Stack Engineer
personalInfo.about: A passionate and creative full-stack developer with over a decade of experience in building scalable web applications. I specialize in the JavaScript ecosystem, with a strong focus on React, Node.js, and modern cloud architectures. I thrive in collaborative environments and am always eager to learn new technologies.

description: Led the development of a high-traffic e-commerce platform using Next.js and TypeScript, improving performance by 40%.
Designed and implemented a microservices architecture on AWS, enhancing scalability and system resilience.
Mentored junior developers, conducting code reviews and promoting best practices.
Developed and maintained client-side applications using React and Redux.
Built RESTful APIs with Node.js and Express, connecting to MongoDB databases.
Collaborated with UX/UI designers to create intuitive and visually appealing user interfaces.

education.degree: Master of Science in Computer Science
Bachelor of Science in Software Engineering

projects.name: Project Enigma
projects.description: An open-source data visualization tool for analyzing complex datasets. Built with D3.js and React.

projects.name: Code Collab
projects.description: A real-time collaborative coding platform featuring video chat and a shared terminal.
